de.engehausen.treemap.impl

Class SquarifiedLayout<N>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.engehausen.treemap.impl.SquarifiedLayout<N>
  • Type Parameters:
    N - the type of node the layout operates on.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICancelable, ITreeMapLayout<N>, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BorderSquarifiedLayout

    public class SquarifiedLayout<N>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ITreeMapLayout<N>, ICancelable, java.io.Serializable
    Squarified tree map layout, used by various implementations such as the SWT and the Swing versions.
    See Also:
    GenericSquarifiedLayout, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SquarifiedLayout(int nestingDepth)
      Creates the layout engine for the given model.

    • Method Detail

      • layout

        public ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> layout(IWeightedTreeModel<N> model,
                               N startNode,
                               int width,
                               int height)
        Description copied from interface: ITreeMapLayout
        Creates a layout of rectangles, starting at the current node for the given width and height.
        Specified by:
        layout in interface ITreeMapLayout<N>
        Parameters:
        model - the tree model to lay out
        startNode - the starting node in the tree model the layout operates on; must not be null.
        width - the width to use for the layout.
        height - the height to use for the layout.
        Returns:
        a tree model holding the rectangles representing the used nodes in hierarchical order, never null.

      • layout

        public ITreeModel<IRectangle<N>> layout(IWeightedTreeModel<N> model,
                               N startNode,
                               int width,
                               int height,
                               ICancelable cancelable)
        Description copied from interface: ITreeMapLayout
        Creates a layout of rectangles, starting at the current node for the given width and height.
        Specified by:
        layout in interface ITreeMapLayout<N>
        Parameters:
        model - the tree model to lay out
        startNode - the starting node in the tree model the layout operates on; must not be null.
        width - the width to use for the layout.
        height - the height to use for the layout.
        cancelable - an indicator that can cancel the layout operation if ICancelable.isCanceled() returns true. The argument must not be null. If the operation is canceled, the result may be incomplete.
        Returns:
        a tree model holding the rectangles representing the used nodes in hierarchical order, never null.

      • isCanceled

        public final boolean isCanceled()
        Description copied from interface: ICancelable
        Returns cancellation state.
        Specified by:
        isCanceled in interface ICancelable
        Returns:
        true if the operation is canceled, false otherwise.
